messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Now before any of you report me for shitposting hear me out. First according to the height of a Minion (which is 3.5 feet on average) Gru is 4 minions tall, which means he is a godly size of 14 feet tall. Furthermore if any of you remember the original Despicable Me, you know there is a scene when Vector kidnaps the three girls and shoots a series of heat-seeking misses at Gru, he then dodges them all. According to the speed of an average ballistic missile (1900 mph) and the size of the missile according to his ankle size, Gru can perceive and move at such a speed that the missiles only move 9.5 miles per hour, 0.5% of their original speed. After this Gru punches a shark and it is paralyzed meaning its spine is probably shattered, to remind you it would require a force greater than 3,000 newtons to fracture the spine.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: So I've never been an anime fan, until quite recently, I'd say the last 2 months. I'd just watched death note back in 2015, and thought why not watch it again. After death note, i watched a couple other anime, mainly, blend-s and tsurezure children. But after that I kept finding new anime to watch, and I watched citrus,kimi no na wa, 3d kanojo, darling in the franxx, and now, oreshure. I figure that's a lot, for me especially, considering i've never been into anime, but i kinda like it now. i listen to some of the songs, especially the openings, of darling in the franxx, and citrus, etc Thing is, I don't wanna turn into a weeb or anything, and I also set my wallpapers from darling in the franxx Are things alright, or am I carrying things a bit too far? I need some help on how to figure this out. Is watching anime and doing stuff like this okay?
